Hello:
 
Well..what else do hey have to do as far as banning weapons? They already  
got the firearms..so swords and knives are next.
 
Still I have sent quite a few swords to Ireland as well as Great Britain  
and I have never had a problem with Customs in either country, but these were 
 not the $99.00 Specials either. Then again they were not made in Japan but 
they  are hand made...geeze...when will the gubberments of there world 
realize that  it's the criminals they need to get off the streets and leave the 
decent folks  alone for a change?
 
JPH  

Dr JP  Hrisoulas, COL NANG (Ret)
Bladesmith.
